biotools.summary: Finds pairs of genes with similar behavior across a gene expression dataset. It is intended to be used as a comparative tool to compare the network size (number of output rows) between N datasets with the same numbers of biological samples (input columns) and measured genes (input rows).

bioschemas.name: Knet

It is intended to be used as a comparative tool to compare the network size (number of output rows) between N datasets with the same numbers of biological samples (input columns) and measured genes (input rows).
